slides.title: Basic Geometry
slides.content:
**Angles:**
Acute < 90°, Right = 90°, Obtuse > 90°
Straight = 180°, Complete = 360°

**Triangle:** Sum of angles = 180°
**Types:** Equilateral (all equal), Isosceles (2 equal), Scalene (all different)

slides.title: Area & Perimeter - 2D
slides.content:
**Rectangle:** Area = L × B, Perimeter = 2(L+B)
**Square:** Area = a², Perimeter = 4a
**Triangle:** Area = ½ × Base × Height
**Circle:** Area = πr², Circumference = 2πr
(π = 22/7 or 3.14)

slides.title: Volume & Surface Area - 3D
slides.content:
**Cube:** Volume = a³, Surface Area = 6a²
**Cuboid:** Volume = L×B×H, SA = 2(LB+BH+HL)
**Cylinder:** Volume = πr²h, Curved SA = 2πrh
**Sphere:** Volume = 4/3 πr³, SA = 4πr²

question.questionText: What is the area of a rectangle with length 10 cm and breadth 5 cm?
question.explanation: Area of rectangle = Length × Breadth = 10 × 5 = 50 cm².
